plot: The press thinks a Jack the Ripper copycat is responsible for a series of recent homicides.

Prostitute killings resemble Jack the Ripper, but this Portland version (possibly a copy cat) chooses only Wesen. Adalind has deserted prince Kenneth and convinced Monroe and Rosalee to prepare the cure her mother taught her, requiring parts of her freshly dug-up corpse. Juliette's vandalism of the Grimm heritage proved her shocking defection, she now indeed teams up with prince Kenneth, obsessed only with revenge on Adalind, who gets 'safe house' sanctuary in feral beaver Bud's home.—KGF Vissers
